TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MemoryMappedFile extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

summary.span: 表示記憶體對應檔。

span.span: Represents a memory-mapped file.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記憶體對應檔會將檔案的內容對應至應用程式的邏輯位址空間。A memory-mapped file maps the contents of a file to an application’s logical address space. 記憶體對應檔可讓程式設計人員使用極大的檔案，因為同時也會管理記憶體，而且它們允許完整的隨機存取，而不需要搜尋的檔案。Memory-mapped files enable programmers to work with extremely large files because memory can be managed concurrently, and they allow complete, random access to a file without the need for seeking. 記憶體對應檔也可以共用多個處理序。Memory-mapped files can also be shared across multiple processes. 方法建立記憶體對應檔案，從指定的路徑或磁碟上現有的檔案。The methods create a memory-mapped file from a specified path or a of an existing file on disk. 變更會自動傳播至磁碟的檔案是未對應。Changes are automatically propagated to disk when the file is unmapped. 方法建立未對應到現有的檔案在磁碟上的記憶體對應檔案，而且是適合用來建立共用的記憶體的處理序間通訊 (IPC)。The methods create a memory-mapped file that is not mapped to an existing file on disk; and are suitable for creating shared memory for interprocess communication (IPC). 記憶體對應檔案可以是選擇性的名稱，可讓記憶體對應檔可共用給其他處理序相關聯。A memory-mapped file can be associated with an optional name that allows the memory-mapped file to be shared with other processes. 您可以建立多個檢視的記憶體對應檔，包括檔案的組件的檢視。You can create multiple views of the memory-mapped file, including views of parts of the file. 您可以將相同的組件的檔案對應至一個以上的地址，以建立並行的記憶體。You can map the same part of a file to more than one address to create concurrent memory. 若要讓兩個檢視維持並行，必須從相同的記憶體對應檔案建立這兩個檢視。For two views to remain concurrent, they have to be created from the same memory-mapped file. 使用兩個檢視中建立的相同檔案的兩個檔案對應並不會提供並行存取。Creating two file mappings of the same file with two views does not provide concurrency. ## Examples 下列範例會針對極大檔案的一部分建立記憶體對應檢視，及操作其中的一部分。The following example creates a memory-mapped view of a part of an extremely large file and manipulates a portion of it. [!code-csharp[MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.createfromfile/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[MemoryMappedFiles.MemoryMappedFile.CreateFromFile#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.createfromfile/vb/program.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks `mode`參數屬於磁碟上的來源檔案。The `mode` parameter pertains to the source file on disk. 如果`capacity`大於磁碟，磁碟上的檔案上的檔案大小會增加至符合指定的容量，即使沒有資料會寫入至記憶體對應檔。If `capacity` is larger than the size of the file on disk, the file on disk is increased to match the specified capacity even if no data is written to the memory-mapped file. 若要防止這個情況發生，指定預設的容量，將會在內部設定 0 （零）`capacity`磁碟上檔案的大小。To prevent this from occurring, specify 0 (zero) for the default capacity, which will internally set `capacity` to the size of the file on disk.

summary.span: 從磁碟上的檔案建立記憶體對應檔案，這個記憶體對應檔具有指定的名稱、大小、存取類型、安全性權限、可繼承性和處置需求。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`capacity`大於磁碟，磁碟上的檔案上的檔案大小會增加至符合指定的容量，即使沒有資料會寫入至記憶體對應檔。If `capacity` is larger than the size of the file on disk, the file on disk is increased to match the specified capacity even if no data is written to the memory-mapped file. 若要防止這個情況發生，指定預設的容量，將會在內部設定 0 （零）`capacity`磁碟上檔案的大小。To prevent this from occurring, specify 0 (zero) for the default capacity, which will internally set `capacity` to the size of the file on disk.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法來建立不保存記憶體對應檔 （也就是沒有關聯的磁碟上的檔案），您可以使用共用處理序之間的資料。Use this method to create a memory-mapped file that is not persisted (that is, not associated with a file on disk), which you can use to share data between processes. ## Examples 下列範例由三個不同的處理序 （主控台應用程式） 所撰寫組成`Boolean`的記憶體對應檔的值。The following example is composed of three separate processes (console applications) that write `Boolean` values to a memory-mapped file. 發生下列順序的動作：The following sequence of actions occur: 1. 程序的建立於記憶體對應檔，並將值寫入它。Process A creates the memory-mapped file and writes a value to it. 2. 程序 B 會開啟記憶體對應檔案，並將值寫入它。Process B opens the memory-mapped file and writes a value to it. 3. 程序 C 開啟記憶體對應檔案，並將值寫入它。Process C opens the memory-mapped file and writes a value to it. 4. 處理程序的讀取，並顯示於記憶體對應檔中的值。Process A reads and displays the values from the memory-mapped file. 5. 處理程序的結束於記憶體對應檔之後，檔案會立即回收記憶體回收。After Process A is finished with the memory-mapped file, the file is immediately reclaimed by garbage collection. 若要執行此範例，請執行下列動作：To run this example, do the following: 1. 編譯應用程式，並開啟三個命令視窗。Compile the applications and open three Command windows. 2. 在第一個命令視窗中，執行程序 a。In the first Command window, run Process A. 3. 在第二個命令視窗中，執行程序 b。In the second Command window, run Process B. 4. 返回的程序，然後按 ENTER。Return to Process A and press ENTER. 5. 在第三個命令視窗中，執行程序 c。In the third Command window, run Process C. 6. 返回的程序，然後按 ENTER。Return to Process A and press ENTER. 處理程序的輸出如下所示：The output of Process A is as follows: ``` Start Process B and press ENTER to continue. Start Process C and press ENTER to continue. Process A says: True Process B says: False Process C says: True ``` **Process A****Process A** [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_X#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_x/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_X#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_x/vb/program.vb#1)] **Process B****Process B** [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_A#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_a/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_A#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_a/vb/program.vb#1)] **Process C****Process C** [!code-csharp[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_B#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_b/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.IO.MemoryMappedFiles_IPC_B#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.io.memorymappedfiles_ipc_b/vb/program.vb#1)]

param.name: offset
param.span: 檢視會在此處開始的位元組。

span.span: The byte at which to start the view.

param.name: size
param.span: 檢視的大小。

span.span: The size of the view.

param.span: 指定 0 (零)，建立開始於 offset 且大約結束在記憶體對應檔結尾的檢視。

span.span: Specify 0 (zero) to create a view that starts at offset and ends approximately at the end of the memory-mapped file.

summary.span: 建立 ，此存取子可對應到記憶體對應檔案的檢視，並且有指定的位移和大小。

span.span: Creates a that maps to a view of the memory-mapped file, and that has the specified offset and size.

returns.span: 記憶體隨機存取區塊。

span.span: A randomly accessible block of memory.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法傳回的隨機存取記憶體對應檔案的檢視。You can use the view returned by this method for random access to a memory-mapped file. 若要建立記憶體對應檔案的完整檢視，請指定 0 （零） 的`size`參數。To create a complete view of the memory-mapped file, specify 0 (zero) for the `size` parameter. 如果這樣做，請檢視的大小可能小於或大於磁碟上的來源檔案的大小。If you do this, the size of the view might be smaller or larger than the size of the source file on disk. 這是因為系統頁面中所提供的檢視和檢視的大小會四捨五入至下一個系統分頁大小。This is because views are provided in units of system pages, and the size of the view is rounded up to the next system page size. ## Examples 下例會建立記憶體對應檔案的檢視和編輯它。The following example creates a view of a memory-mapped file and edits it. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個方法所傳回的循序存取至記憶體對應檔案，例如處理序間通訊的資料流。You can use the stream returned by this method for sequential access to a memory-mapped file, such as for inter-process communications. 若要建立記憶體對應檔案的完整檢視，請指定 0 （零） 的`size`參數。To create a complete view of the memory-mapped file, specify 0 (zero) for the `size` parameter. 如果這樣做，請檢視的大小可能小於或大於磁碟上的來源檔案的大小。If you do this, the size of the view might be smaller or larger than the size of the source file on disk. 這是因為系統頁面中所提供的檢視和檢視的大小會四捨五入至下一個系統分頁大小。This is because views are provided in units of system pages, and the size of the view is rounded up to the next system page size.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 記憶體對應檔案可以是任一個持續性的記憶體對應檔案 （磁碟上的檔案與相關聯） 或非保存。The memory-mapped file can be either a persisted memory-mapped file (associated with a file on disk) or non-persisted. ## Examples **開啟保存的記憶體對應檔****Opening a Persisted Memory-Mapped File** 下列範例會開啟記憶體對應檔，名為`ImgA`，已建立從磁碟上的檔案 (如範例所示方法)。The following example opens a memory-mapped file named `ImgA` that has already been created from a file on disk (as shown in the example for the method). [!code-csharp[memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.openexisting#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.openexisting/cs/program.cs#1)] [!code-vb[memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.openexisting#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/memorymappedfiles.memorymappedfile.openexisting/vb/program.vb#1)] **開啟的非保存記憶體對應檔****Opening a Non-Persisted Memory-Mapped File** 下列範例會開啟記憶體對應檔，用於處理序間通訊。The following example opens a memory-mapped file used for inter-process communication. 這個程式碼範例是針對所提供之較大範例的一部分方法。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the method.
